detail: Alawar is a team of 100+ professionals who share passion for games. Our offices are located in the very heart of Siberia - Novosibirsk and Barnaul. Each internal studio is a full-cycle development team that works on one game at a time, with an average development term of 12-18 months per a project. We cultivate a close-knit team environment and encourage flexibility and operational efficiency.
